info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 7:34AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...ALLEGANY...SOUTHERN ERIE...AND WYOMING COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a half mile. This band of heavy snow is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 1.5 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 734 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from Westfield to near Franklinville. Expect additional pockets of heavy snow into some of the higher terrain of the Western Southern Tier and far southern Erie and Wyoming counties. The heavy snow will remain nearly stationary for the next few hours. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Salamanca, Allegany State Park, Boston, Springville, Warsaw, Westfield, Lakewood, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Falconer, Ashford, Arcade, Allegany, Franklinville, Mayville and Cuba. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 61 and 59. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 29. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
